channel.title: Japan West on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Japan West on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk is now available in Austria East and in a second Availability Zone in Japan West
item.description:
Azure Premium SSD v2 is now generally available in Austria East and in a second Availability Zone in Japan West. The next-generation general-purpose block storage offers sub-millisecond latencies and improved price-performance.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server availability zones expansion in Japan West
item.description:
Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server is now generally available in all three availability zones in Japan West, allowing deployments that improve availability and resiliency.

  • Source: Azure Updates
